caption: Definitely recommend this place! It is a little pricey, and portions could definitely be bigger! But it definitely is tasty, and definitely recommend the Mexican Bowl.

The food wasn’t what I expected 🤮 it was dry and no salt or no taste !!!!!!! Not sure if the person that cooked it was having a bad day but I could of got this at a Mexican restaurant for way less !!!

Delicious Bowls of flavorful food! I couldn’t stop eating! The Columbian Bowl has enough for 2 meals - or one meal if you’re super hungry. The guacamole and chips are a perfect addition. This will be my new favorite delivery or pick up. Plus all food containers are paper + certified compostable! I’m impressed.
Really good food. I got the Colombian bowl with shredded pork, plantains, black beans and brown rice. Great the first day, great leftovers two days later.

I ordered from this place on Ubereats one late night. It was really worth it. The food tasted great and it also was cheap. I haven't gone to this place in person so I don't know about the service and ambience of this place. But the food tastes great.
